title: (x) As Seen On TV logo - Myriad {Patricia}
content:
Anyone have an idea on this typeface? Its on the tip of my tongue.

I’ve given it a couple guesses but I am having a hard time matching the vertical terminals on the S.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [As seen on TV-logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070125200256/http:/typophile.com/files/As%20seen%20on%20TV-logo.jpg) | 9.42 KB |
author: fixxwisdom

comments.content:
That’ what I thought too but it looks a little off. I think I will go with it anywho. :)

ok thanks.

I’ve seen this logo reproduced in a number of different typefaces. What’s more important than the typeface is the shape of the frame and the proportion of “AS SEEN ON” to “TV”.

- Lex
